content: this is the final square in a series of three free filet crochet pattern blocks that i m launching before christmas 2024 each block is a different christmas tree you can use these to make table runners placemats blankets or whatever you choose to gauge is not important and whilst i have made mine in dk acrylic please feel free to make yours in any yarn of your choice with an appropriate hook for the yarn for info my stats were each block is 30 stitches wide by 21 row long each block weighs 21g and used 61 metres of yarnsmiths create dk in parchment 290m/100g final measurements- each block measures 26cm long by 20cm wide gauge 15 sts x 10 row= 10cmx 10cm however gauge is not crucial for this pattern i d love to see your makes so please tag me on instagram @crochetscot and #crochetscot
